TextLang.Text: You can exchange the hard disk installed in this system with another hard disk. Carefully read the following information, and then select [OK].
Prepare a hard disk that is compatible with this system. You can only exchange the hard disk if the capacity of the new hard disk is larger than the capacity of the current hard disk.
Connect the replacement hard disk to the system using the USB cable supplied with this disc.
You must copy data that is saved on this system to the replacement hard disk before exchanging the hard disk. Do not exchange the hard disk before copying data.
All data that is saved on the replacement hard disk will be deleted.
The copied data will not be available if the replacement hard disk is installed in another PS3™ system.
The system will restart several times during this operation.
To copy data that is saved on this system, connect the replacement hard disk to the system using the supplied USB cable. Do you want to start copying now?

Trophies cannot be copied by performing this operation. Do you want to continue?
To copy trophies, go to [Game] > [Trophy Collection] and select [Sync with Server] from the options menu to sync the trophy information for the users listed below.
